actions.description: The gnoll makes one Bite attack and two Shortsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: Until the end of the turn, the gnoll's speed increases by 60 feet and it doesn't provoke opportunity attack.
actions.name: Sudden Rush
